attributes.title: Scary Cheeto man
attributes.review: I get really bad nightmares when I see scary things or watch scary videos. I’m not really sure why but I do. I downloaded the app and saw the scariest thing ever a dusty cheeto man. This was about 3 weeks ago. I still have nightmares. Sometimes he comes to me while I’m asleep and I wake up screaming because I can smell his garlic breath. I think I should go to therapy... I’m still having these nightmares. Please pray for me.

attributes.title: FAKE NEWS!!
attributes.review: when i got this app, it asked for my addres, and i would do anything for MY president so i  typed it in. it asked for my gender (female) and i gave it, but then a BIG SWEATY WHITE MAN came to my house and forced his way in, hurting my poor grandma in the process. he then PROCEEDED to PUSH my grandma out of a window, and teabag me while screaming TRUMP 2020. i am SHOCKED and OUTRAGED! i will not be supporting trump in the upcoming electon ANYMORE! my poor  meemaw is in the HOSPITAL NOW! i hate this app and i hate trump. KANYE FOR PRIESDENT!!!

attributes.title: No. Just no.
attributes.review: Awful app. The whole thing is terrible. Terrible. It actually is repulsive how bad this app is. Should be removed. Don’t understand by anybody would want to download this app. I wish I could go back in time and reverse ever using my battery life to download this app. I’m telling you. Just don’t do it. Go download candy crush or temple run. Just whatever you do. Don’t get this app.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE
attributes.review:
As soon as I downloaded it my private information was being stolen. The app was taking pictures without me using it. Then my bank told that app was using my money without MY CONSENT. That not the worst part I was sent DISGUSTING PICTURES OF A NAKED CHEETO THAT HAD A MICROSCOPIC PENIS. After that happened half the screen on my phone was BLACK OUT MEANING I COULDN'T SEE THE OTHER HALF OF MY SCREEN. I HAD TO BUY WHOLE NEW PHONE FOR $900. 

IN ALL I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING THIS APP IF I COULD I WOULD GIVE THIS APP ZERO STARS

Here’s what I would say to the app and Trump

I bought u some flowers✨🥺🌸 they’re dead just like your love life🌸🧚🏻 

everyone has a plan in life🥰🤍🧚🏼‍♀️🌸 yours should’ve been plan b🌈💟😘

your zodiac sign✨✨💘❤️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🦋but make it cancer🌟✨💖❣️💞💗🧚🏼‍♀️

Keep smiling!☀️💞🤩🧚🏼💅🏻 Yellows My Favorite Color!💝💅🏻🧚🏼🥺

everyone is a gift from god 💗🌸✨🧚‍♀️hope your parents kept the receipt

Cyberbullying is never ok 🥰🤗😊💕 but you’re the only exception 🧚🏻‍♂️🥰💕🤩🤗😊👑💅😚✨🥰

take a nap🦄✨🦋🌸 cameron boyce style 🌸🦋🧚‍♀️

As Hannah Montana once said “no one is perfect ❤️🥺🧚🏼‍♂️🥰 u proved it 👀🧚🏻‍♀️💅🏻🦋🦄🌸 

everyone makes mistakes✨🧚🏻‍♀️🌸💕lets say  your parents for example🧚🏻‍♀️🌟💕✨

sleep well tonight🧚✨🥰just don’t wake up💕🌼🌞

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: If I could give this app 0 stars, I would. It’s clear that there’s no consideration. The ads are horrible. The app lags me out and freezes. It’s impossible to do anything with this app!!! I can’t believe I downloaded it. A complete waste of my time... I’m never downloading any app involving trump again! This app even gave my phone a virus!! I didn’t even think that was POSSIBLE!!! 😤 I’m done.

attributes.title: Orange man😡🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊
attributes.review: Soooo I down loaded this app today and wanted to see my pedo-ra- I mean president buttt I felt violated it asked me what’s my name!!!! Whattttttt inappropriate I do not have to tell u my name eghhhhhhh and then I saw there was this song it was like have😊you😉ever🤫been😳snaked😈by🧚🏾a🧚🏽‍♀️friend💖and😴just🙃for🤡the🤖clout 👅they🗣do🤨it🤪again🤬 and it was scarrrrryyyyyyy I almost went into a comma so unless you want ghetto man singing to you don’t get the app!!!!!!

attributes.title: ⚠️⚠️⚠️DISTURBING⚠️⚠️⚠️
attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! My eyes were PERMANENTLY damaged from seeing a picture of the most ugly cheeto breaded piece of blubber person who has the IQ of a barnacle who just so happens to be the president of the us, ew! If you are considering getting this app, I would HIGHLY CONSIDER going to your doctor after visiting the app as the image displayed can cause SEVERE side effects or even trauma. thank you for your time and good luck, you will get through this.

attributes.title: ive never been more terrified
attributes.review: this app is absolutely unsettling in many ways.  there were photos of the worst tanned man I have ever seen.  this is direct hate speech against minors and minorities of all sorts.  do not let anyone you know buy this app because not only is it awful to look at and read it installed malware on my phone leading to loss of sound and the ability to type capitol letters.

attributes.title: This app is trash
attributes.review: I opened the app to see text that sighted “you are the reason America is not great you must kill your self signed Donald J. trump” I think that this is a very offensive statement and bad label and face for our country. Then after I clicked out of this title and there was a picture of a naked mango. This was very shocking to see and I never want to see it again. Overall this app is horrible and disturbing.
